ygData.subject: RE: Runed Bone Fork......
ygData.msgSnippet: DId they change it from the staff of Writhing to a staff of withering? Or are we talking about a different staff? ... From: John Tatsukawa
ygData.messageBody:
DId they change it from the staff of Writhing to a staff of withering?
Or are we talking about a different staff?



-----Original Message-----
From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:jht@...]
Sent: Friday, January 07, 2000 12:54 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Runed Bone Fork......


> -----Original Message-----

> From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]

> Sent: Friday, January 07, 2000 9:30 AM

> To: eqbards@onelist.com

> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Runed Bone Fork......

<cut>

> I offered my useless Staff of Withering, and he jumped on it.

> A much better deal for him, than I. Those staves are worth

> a lot more than the fork.



A very nice deal. At least on Bertox the Staff of Withering is worth around

500 pp or so. I'm sure it's cheaper on the older servers. This guy had a

pretty nice deal going.



> Then greed set in.

<cut>

> Then more greed set in.



Lol, why do you think the recent spat of gameshows are doing so well here in

the US? The popular gameshow "Greed" has the host asking contestents, "Do

you feel the need for greed?"



I guess this guy was saying, "Yes!"



> -----Original Message-----

> From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]

> Sent: Friday, January 07, 2000 8:20 AM

> To: eqbards@onelist.com

> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Runed Bone Fork......

>

>

> > I believe it comes from the same Froglok Squire (thats not

> his name) in

> > Upper Guk I asked about...

>

> Now that's funny. They should put that on the EQ Guide Application.

>

> Which mob drops the runed bone fork?

>

> a) scryer

> b) squire

> c) scribe



Can I use a lifeline?



It's, b) squire. Yes, Regis, that's my final answer. :-)



---Windleaf



P.S.

My wife loves these shows, I can't avoid them. I prefer "Win Ben Stein's

Money" myself. Have we gotten far enough off topic on this? Sorry Squire!
